com.orchestranetworks.service

Class ValidationSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orchestranetworks.service.ValidationSpec

  • public final class ValidationSpec
extends Object
    Defines the properties for validating a dataset, a table or a record.
    Since:
    5.9.0
    See Also:
    Adaptation.getValidationReport(ValidationSpec), Adaptation.getValidationReportForNode(SchemaNode, ValidationSpec), AdaptationTable.getValidationReport(ValidationSpec)

    • Method Detail

      • isActivationEnsured

        public boolean isActivationEnsured()
        Indicates if the validation must also ensure that the current dataset is activated.
        See Also:
        setActivationEnsured(boolean)

      • setActivationEnsured

        public void setActivationEnsured(boolean ensureActivation)
        Specifies if the validation must also check that the current dataset is activated.

        By default, this property is set to true.

        Parameters:
        ensureActivation - if true, the validation also checks that the current dataset activated (it adds an error if this is not the case).

      • isResultLogged

        public boolean isResultLogged()
        Indicates if the result of the validation must be added to the logs generated by EBX®.
        See Also:
        setResultLogged(boolean)

      • setResultLogged

        public void setResultLogged(boolean logValidationResult)
        Specifies if the result of the validation must be added to the logs generated by EBX®.

        This property is ignored when validating a record or a field. That is, the result of the validation of a record or a field is never added to the logs of EBX®.

        By default this property is set to true when validating a dataset or a table.

      • setRefreshPolicy

        public void setRefreshPolicy(ValidationSpec.RefreshPolicy aPolicy)
        Specifies the refresh policy when validating a dataset, a table or a record.
        See Also:
        ValidationSpec.RefreshPolicy

      • getRefreshPolicy

        public ValidationSpec.RefreshPolicy getRefreshPolicy()
        See Also:
        setRefreshPolicy(RefreshPolicy)
